PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2012-03602012-03-29,  ,  ,  ,  NRCAN,  NEB, 
ActNational Energy Board Act
SubjectCertificate of Public Convenience and Necessity EC-25 - H2O Power G.P. Inc./Commandité H2O Énergie Inc.
PrecisOrder approving the ISSUANCE OF AMENDING ORDER AO-003-EC-25 to reflect the name change of the certificate holder and operator of the international power line from Abitibi Consolidated Hydro Inc to H2O Power G.P. Inc. / Commandité H2O Énergie Inc. on behalf of H2O Power Limited Partnership / Société en commandite H2O Énergie.
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Certificate of Public Convenience and Necessity EC-25 - H2O Power G.P. Inc./Commandité H2O Énergie Inc.
precis: Order approving the ISSUANCE OF AMENDING ORDER AO-003-EC-25 to reflect the name change of the certificate holder and operator of the international power line from Abitibi Consolidated Hydro Inc to H2O Power G.P. Inc. / Commandité H2O Énergie Inc. on behalf of H2O Power Limited Partnership / Société en commandite H2O Énergie.
